title.narrative: Radio Musi O Tunya - Good Governance and Democracy Programme II

description.narrative: Radio Musi O Tunya is a community radio station in Livingstone. This project is continuation to previously supported Good Governance project which received good response in the election year of 2011. This project aims at consolidating work started in provi ding a platform for citizens to hold thier duty bearers accountable. Project objectives are:a) Increase knowledge on relevant policies (Health Gender Education Disability etc) and their entitlements for citizens by 2014.b) To improve relationship between t he citizens and policy makers CSOs and service providers.c) To help communities know how to channel their grievances and be aware of the organizations working in their communities.d) To improve the capacity of ten radio staff on governance and human rights and community engagement by 2014.Project duration is 2 years: 1.6.2012-31.5.2014.
